statements: DELETE FROM energy_usage_in_smart_buildings WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 AND timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
DELETE FROM energy_usage_in_smart_buildings WHERE room_id = 101 AND sensor_id = 201;
DELETE FROM energy_usage_in_smart_buildings WHERE building_id = 200 AND energy_consumed < 500 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM buildings WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM energy_meters WHERE building_id = 1 AND energy_reading < 1000;
DELETE FROM appliances WHERE room_id IN (SELECT room_id FROM rooms WHERE building_id = 1);
DELETE FROM rooms WHERE building_id = 2 AND area > 100;
DELETE FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 3 AND total_energy_usage = 0.00;
DELETE FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM energy_usage WHERE date_of_reading < '2022-01-01')
DELETE FROM rooms WHERE building_id IN (SELECT building_id FROM buildings WHERE location = 'New York')
DELETE FROM rooms WHERE building_id IN (SELECT building_id FROM buildings WHERE location = 'New York')
